Field1.name: ‚ÑπÔ∏è A Quick Note on `/fx` Commands
Field1.value: All commands with the suffix `/fx` scrape **ForexFactory.com** for scheduled news and insights. These events help traders gauge market safety and potential volatility.

Field2.name: üõ†Ô∏è Setup Commands (PLEASE DO THESE FIRST)
Field2.value:
**`/register`**
Registers you with our database. This is **REQUIRED** for announcement channel persistence and future features.

**`/set-announcement-channel`**
Dictates where Misty will send automated messages (online status, market open announcements, etc.). **PLEASE SET THIS** to avoid missing important status updates!

Field3.name: üìä ForexFactory Commands
Field3.value:
**`/fx-high-impact`**
Returns only *HIGH IMPACT* news scheduled today.

**`/fx-currency-lookup <currency>`**
Filters news by currency (e.g., `USD`).

**`/fx-pair-lookup <pair>`**
Filters news by pair (e.g., `EUR/USD`).

Field1.name: üìà Trading Strategy (Proof of Concept)
Field1.value:
**`/define-strategy`**
Define a simple trading strategy to backtest. It is saved to Misty's database and persists for this server. This is an extremely restricted approach intended as a proof of concept.

**`/backtest-strategy`**
Misty will run your strategy in our custom engine. Due to Discord and hardware limitations, it uses a vectorized approach which is less accurate. Currently limited to the **S&P 500** as other data sources are costly/difficult to implement.

Field2.name: üßÆ Risk Management
Field2.value:
**`/risk-calculation`**
Generates ideal position size based on risk tolerance. Works with majors like EURUSD, GBPUSD, AUDUSD, USDCAD, etc.

‚ö†Ô∏è **Disclaimer:** Calculation uses a standard lot size of 100,000 units and assumes a 4-decimal pair. For non-standard pairs (like those including **JPY**), this tool will not give expected results.

Field3.name: ‚åõ Other Commands
Field3.value: Still under construction. Stay tuned for new features!
